subject: plymouth: Add boot indicator when loading Tizen
commitMessage:
plymouth: Add boot indicator when loading Tizen

To avoid overloading the boot mode of plymouth, use two different
scripts for install and boot.

Change-Id: Iea881175e5ca0ee00570fc8b9555a2933110ee03
Signed-off-by: William Douglas <william.douglas@intel.com>
